page.shortlink: api client api a5 panellayout panel object
page.description: Definition of a panel in the panel layout.

property.name: src
property.description: The panel class.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the panel. Used to access the panel in the layout, such as when calling the A5.PanelLayout.setActivePanel method.

property.name: title
property.description: The title (display friendly HTML) of the panel.

property.name: show
property.description: Whether or not to show the panel in the layout.

property.name: size
property.description: The size (width if the flow is horizontal and height if the flow is vertical) of the panel in the layout. Values can be in CSS units (for example "250px", or "3in"), use a flex syntax (for example "flex(1)" and "flex(2)" - if a layout had two panels in it with each of these values then one panel would be 1/3 the width and the other 2/3), or use a percentage of the available space (for example "50%"). The default is "flex(1)".

property.name: minSize
property.description: The minimum size (width if the flow is horizontal and height if the flow is vertical) of the panel in the layout. Values must be in absolute CSS units (for example "250px", or "3in").

property.name: dock
property.description: The dock behavior for the panel. Values can be "none", "collapse-before", "collapse-after", "auto-collapse-before" and "auto-collapse-after". The collapse before/after will always dock the panel while the auto collapse will only dock the panel if there is not enough room to layout all the panels.

property.name: controls
property.description: Layout control bindings.

property.name: prev
property.description: A previous panel button.

property.name: has
property.description: Whether or not the panel has a previous panel button.

property.name: id
property.description: The ID of the button element (which must already be in the DOM). The default is "{panel.id}.CTRL.PREV".

property.name: settings
property.description: The button settings.

property.name: next
property.description: A next panel button.

property.name: has
property.description: Whether or not the panel has a next panel button.

property.name: id
property.description: The ID of the button element (which must already be in the DOM). The default is "{panel.id}.CTRL.NEXT".

property.name: settings
property.description: The button settings.

property.name: flowCollapse
property.description: A collapse flow button to toggle the visibility of all panels before the current panel in the flow.

property.name: has
property.description: Whether or not the panel has a collapse flow button.

property.name: id
property.description: The ID of the button element (which must already be in the DOM). The default is "{panel.id}.CTRL.FLOWCOLLAPSE".

property.name: settings
property.description: The button settings.

property.name: states
property.description: Settings for the each state

property.name: collapse
property.description: Settings for the collapse state.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML to put in the button when it will collapse the flow. The default is "«".

property.name: expand
property.description: Settings for the expand state.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML to put in the button when it will expand the flow. The default is "»".

property.name: isDocked
property.description: Whether or not the panel is docked.
